item.title: Tutorial: Quick EDA in Python using Pandas Profiling
item.description: EDA is one of the most important part of any data science work. Recently I have came accross a library called pandas profiling which makes it easier and creates a beautiful shareable report. So, here I am sharing some resouces related to the project which I feel can be useful.
